summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Graham Street, in the City of Seattle, from Rainier Avenue to 32nd Avenue South, by planking the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2838, of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
